text: The 2014–15 FAW Welsh Cup was the 128th season of the annual knockout tournament for competitive football teams in Wales. The 2014–15 tournament commenced on 23 August 2014, and ended on 2 May 2015. The New Saints were the defending champions and successfully defended its title by defeating Newtown in the final. This meant The New Saints qualified to the first qualifying round of the 2015–16 UEFA Europa League. ==Qualifying Round One== The matches were scheduled to be played on the weekend of 30/31 August
